ABOUT ARCHIVES COWBOYS CONTRIBUTE

Songs of the Cowboy (Vol.01)

OWEN EARL   29 November ’19

Listenin’


Cowboy Collective is kicking things off with the very first volume of cowboy songs! Listen! Get inspired! Think about all the possible music videos and other art that can be made! When you’ve got your proposal ready, mosey on over to https://cowboycollective.cc/music!

You can download (and pay for if you like) the album over at BandCamp, and the “Songs of the Cowboy” releases always come with a collection of “Remix Stems” to help make all kinds of cowboy art.

Happy Hunting!
